nodes.bodyText: This is to make sure the BIR version of the reader and the writer. This was changed earlier, as the stream type was removed. However, since this is sort of a revert PR, and we re-introduce stream type, earlier BIR version should still support, without any issues
We can remove this as we dont have any streamTypeChecker related code now
